Name: Issue 244
Introduction: Happy weekend everyone! A pretty light issue this week, but lots of great releases for you to dig into over the weekend.   I'm literally about to board a flight to Seattle to go and visit "The Mothership" hopefully I get time to catch up with some amazing Xamarin peeps. Also, please go and check out our sponsor [Xablu](https://www.xablu.com/training/#) to learn about their Xamarin training options! Have a great weekend everyone and see you back next week. ❤️ Kym

Articles.Title: Building Xamarin.Forms Apps on Azure DevOps using Templates
Articles.Description: Need to easily add CI to your Xamarin.Forms project?  Well, Nick Randolph is putting together some Azure DevOps templates to kick start any Xamarin.Forms DevOps pipeline.  This is awesome because as he says in the blog post, normally we end up just recreating the same pipelines over and over again.
Articles.Author: Nick Randolph

Articles.Title: What’s New with Location and Bluetooth APIs on iOS 13
Articles.Description: With the recently announced iOS 13, we see that Apple’s approach to location privacy is getting more and more serious. This new update will include recurring notifications for users to see whether the app uses their location in the background or not, allowing them to adjust the setting regularly.
Articles.Author: Anıl taşkıran

Articles.Title: Picking a Document In Xamarin.iOS
Articles.Description: Logesh shows you how to pick a file from your iOS device in a Xamarin iOS application.
Articles.Author: Logesh Palani

Articles.Title: Integrating Braintree with Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: In this article, Rendy shows you how to add Braintree client-side integration in a Xamarin Forms app. For those not familiar with Braintree:> Braintree Payment Gateway is a simple and modern way to accept payments. Along with its list of flexible features, it provides the ability to merchants to accept payments online or within a mobile application. [**Braintree integration in Xamarin Forms (Part.1 )**](https://www.xamboy.com/2020/01/28/braintree-integration-in-xamarin-forms-part-1/) by Rendy

Articles.Title: Keep it clean!
Articles.Description: Sermet has some tips for cleaning up your Xamarin environment and saving some space.  As a cheeky little bonus, he also lists out his favourite libraries for Xamarin development
Articles.Author: Sermet

Articles.Title: Preferences in Xamarin Forms
Articles.Description: Leomaris shows how to get started with storing preferences using Xamarin.Essentials in your Xamarin.Forms project.
Articles.Author: Leomaris Reyes

Articles.Title: New embedded fonts goodness
Articles.Description: Most production apps will use custom fonts to add a nice styling.  But if you have done this before,  you'll know it's a real pain.  Javier shows a now option with Forms 4.5 that just makes things easier. **Note: Post is in Spanish**
Articles.Author: Javier Suárez

Articles.Title: Google Login Integration in Xamarin Forms: A Complete Guide
Articles.Description: Login is very common but so is having to remember a load of passwords and usernames. For this reason, it is becoming more and more common that we can log in to apps with existing accounts from social media. One of my most common accounts I use is Google. This shows you how to do it!
Articles.Author: Vijayakumar Yoganandan

Articles.Title: Merge Conflict: 186: Hot Hot Hot
Articles.Description: Everything is HOT! XAML Hot Reload, Hot Restart, Hot UI, Hot Hot, and the Hottest of the Hot and we discuss it all!

Articles.Title: Visual Studio 2019 for Mac version 8.5 Preview 2 is available
Articles.Description: Visual Studio 2019 for Mac 8.5 Preview 2 is ready to download today! The latest preview of Visual Studio for Mac adds a handful of neat features and fixes that were direct requests from our users such as: One of the most requested features from our ASP.
Articles.Author: Dominic Nahous

Articles.Title: New Sharpnado!
Articles.Description: Sharpnado has a new release with Dark mode and draggable cell improvements!
Articles.Author: Jean-Marie Alfonsi

Articles.Title: Shiny 1.0 Release
Articles.Description: Shiny Version 1.0 is released. Enough said.  Go get it! [**Shiny 1.0 Release**](https://allancritchie.net/posts/shiny10)

Articles.Title: What's New in Visual Studio 2019 version 16.5 Preview 2
Articles.Description: This week, Visual Studio 2019 version 16.5 Preview 2 was released, bringing several new features and improvements for mobile developers in Visual Studio to help you build better mobile apps, faster.
